attributes.title: there was enough room for jack too.
attributes.review:
JACK

Rose, listen to me. Listen. Winning that ticket was the best thing that
ever happened to me.

Jack is having trouble getting the breath to speak.

                                   JACK

It brought me to you. And I'm thankful, Rose. I'm thankful.

His voice is trembling with the cold which is working tis way to his heart.
But his eyes are unwavering.

                                   JACK

You must do me this honor... promise me you will survive... that you will
never give up... no matter what happens... no matter how hopeless...
promise me now, and never let go of that promise.

                                   ROSE

I promise.

                                   JACK

Never let go.

                                   ROSE

I promise. I will never let go, Jack. I'll never let go.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I can worship my favorite angry orange baby man, but the app is pure trash! When I first got it everything seemed fine, but then it started talking to my girlfriend. She left me for this app! Then, rubbing salt in my wounds, the app stole my best friend. After crying for days on end I finally confronted the app. He called me a little baby and beat me up! I tried the press charges but the police sided with the app! 1/5 stars for being a home wrecker and a face wrecker

attributes.review: Hello. I am here to say DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! I downloaded this app and it crashed my whole phone screen! I had to go to my local phone fixing store to get my screen fixed.
